intro: Euphrasia glabrescens, commonly known as the smooth eyebright, is a small flowering plant native to parts of Europe and Asia. It belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and is characterized by its delicate, yellowish-orange flowers that bloom in early spring. The plant typically grows in moist, shady habitats such as woodlands and meadows. Its leaves are lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs, while its stems are often prostrate or upright depending on the growing conditions. Euphrasia glabrescens is known for its medicinal properties and has been used in traditional herbal remedies.
